quotes.quote: He who prides himself upon wealth and honor hastens his own downfall.
When your outgo exceeds your income, the upshot may be your downfall.
Conceit may bring about one's own downfall.
From triumph to downfall is but a step. I have seen a trifle decide the most important issues in the gravest affairs.
Power, safely defied, touches its downfall.
Those who pray for your downfall are concentrating negative thoughts towards you, without taking cognisance of the slippery ground in which they are standing, which could lead to their downfall.
National injustice is the surest road to national downfall.
Pride of opinion has been responsible for the downfall of more men on Wall Street than any other factor.
I don't spend my hours plotting for somebody else's downfall.
It is the downfall of evil, that it never sees far enough ahead.
Our downfall as a species is that we are arrogant enough to think that we can control Mother Nature and stupid enough to think it is our job.
Displaying riches and titles with pride brings about one's downfall.
Complacency will be the architecture of your downfall.
We may run into many downfalls in life, but with a mighty God on our side those downfalls have already been defeated.
The downfall of most diets is that they restrict your intake of food.
The downfall of every civilization comes, not from the moral corruption of the common man, but rather from the moral complacency of common men in high places.
Public downfalls are more painful and humiliating than private ones.
A man's pride can be his downfall, and he needs to learn when to turn to others for support and guidance.
Our sins are our downfall. We must repent and return to the Lord. And He will receive and forgive us graciously.
The straight line leads to the downfall of humanity.
